update: Launched Notion AI with GPT-4 integration for automatic note summarization and content generation. Beta users report 3x faster documentation. Pricing: $10/month add-on.
Raised $185M Series F at $11B valuation. Plans to expand AI features and enterprise sales team by 200%. CEO announced aggressive market expansion.
Increased enterprise tier pricing from $19 to $29/user/month (52% increase). Includes AI assistant, advanced reporting, and white-label options. Existing customers grandfathered for 3 months.
LinkedIn campaign 'Work Without Limits' reached 5M impressions with 12% CTR. Features customer testimonials from Nike, Hulu, and Coca-Cola. Budget estimated at $2M.
Released 'Goals' feature connecting OKRs to daily tasks. Early data shows 40% increase in team alignment scores. Mobile app downloads up 150% week-over-week.
Viral Twitter thread from former Airbnb PM: 'Switched our entire team to Linear, velocity up 3x'. 50K+ likes, 800+ companies requesting demos. Sign-ups spiked 400%.
Partnered with Google Workspace for native Docs/Sheets integration. Allows real-time collaboration and bi-directional sync. Announced at Google Cloud Next conference.
TikTok campaign targeting Gen Z professionals hits 10M views. Features productivity hacks and board templates. Conversion to free trial: 18% (3x industry average).
Y Combinator W25 grad raised $8M seed led by Sequoia. Built autonomous project manager using AI agents. 1000+ teams on waitlist, NPS score of 85.
Switched to flat-rate pricing: $299/month unlimited users. Positioning as 'Anti-SaaS' alternative. Founder blog post went viral on Hacker News (1200+ upvotes).
Published enterprise ROI calculator showing $2.4M savings for 500-person teams. Being used in cold outbound sales sequences. Booking 30% more demos.
YouTube ad campaign 'Work Smarter' targeting project managers. 2M views, 200K channel subscribers. Featuring industry experts and customer success stories.
Launched AI Sprint Coach that predicts sprint risks and suggests mitigation. Beta customers report 35% fewer sprint failures. Atlassian Intelligence integrated across platform.
Free tier now limited to 3 projects (was 5). Pushing users to $12/mo paid plan. Email campaign: '80% of free users upgrade within 60 days'. Possible monetization pressure.
AI calendar + task manager combo hits $10M ARR in 18 months. Featured on Tim Ferriss podcast, 500K downloads. Unique value prop: 'Intelligent time blocking'. Average user saves 1hr/day.
Webinar 'Build Your Second Brain' hosted 15K live attendees. Conversion rate to paid: 22%. Template marketplace revenue up 300% QoQ. Community strategy paying off.
Case study: Dropbox migrated entire product roadmap to Airtable. 300+ person PM team, $500K+ annual contract. Being pitched to similar scale-ups.
Instagram Reels campaign targeting remote workers: 8M reach, 500K saves. Features aesthetic workspace setups + productivity tips. Brand recall up 45% in target demo.
Affiliate program launched: 30% recurring commission for first year. 500+ YouTubers/bloggers signed up. Projection: 20% of new customers via affiliates by Q1 2026.
GitHub integration update: Auto-create issues from PR comments, sync status bidirectionally. Developer NPS jumped from 72 to 89. Stealing share from Jira in eng teams.
